### About this site

This is the website for p8105 homework 4. The website contains

Problem 1: The development of website, the brief resume, network links (email, github, and linkedin) of the author.

Problem 2: Data analysis of dataset "NYC Restaurant Inspections". Three plots are drwan, 1. boxplot which describes Inspection scores for select cuisines; 2. bar plot which show the Number of restaurant for select cuisine; 3. scatter plot which compare the average score for select cuisine in each zipcode.
